captions.text: (group laughing)
- Oh I know, I know!

Let's all go around the
table and talk about
what we're thankful for this year.
How about you guys start?
- Well...

I'm thankful that I always
have a ride from the airport.
- I'm thankful that I have someone who can
get me out of plans I don't want to make.
Oh your play!
Yeah I'd love to go but we...

have to visit her family
the next morning, yeah.
Sorry about that.
I'm also thankful that I have someone

who will listen to me
complain about my co-workers.

And then he just turns, and
takes credit for my idea!
- Ugh, you're kidding me.
I'm thank that I have someone who

will listen to me
complain about my family.
I mean I'm not really going to do that
because shes my sister and I love her
but I mean come on!
- I know right?
I'm thankful that I have someone

who will remind me what
I don't like on a menu.
What's "osso buco"?
- That's veal, you won't like it.
- Right.
- Do you want me to order for you?
- Please.
- I'm thankful that I have someone
who can act as my mirror.
Hey, do I have spinach in my teeth?
- Uhhh no, you're good.

I'm thankful that I have
someone who can reach
all those hard to reach spots.
- Oh, yup, that's it.
That's the spot, right there, right there.
- I'm thankful that I have someone who can
provide the other voice in conversations.
Emmet did you have a good day?
- (funny voice) It was pretty good.
- Yeah?
- (funny voice) Yeah, just kinda got up,
then I went to the litter box,
and then i took a little poop poop.
- I love it when you do that.
- Thanks.
But you know what I'm really thankful for?
That I have someone who will kill me,
before they let a zombie eat me.
- One bullet left.
(gunshot)
- Ok.

Um Grandpa, what are you
thankful for this year?
Thankful for.
Thankful.
It's Thanksgiving.
Don't say zombies.

- You can be thankful for
zombies Grandpa, it's ok,
but you know if you attack us
then we're gonna kill you.
- They're gonna kill you Grandpa.

title: Weird Things Couples Are Thankful For

comments.text: I love these two. Holy smoke, are they amazing﻿

comments.text:
Voicing the pet can be fun. Especially when you have the pet say what your 
partner is saying, like "dude, you totally screwed that thing up", and then 
your partner is trying not to laugh, because they're thinking that but 
would never say it, but appreciate that you're indirectly admitting you 
screwed something up. Pets are great diffusers of situations.﻿
